snippet: Governments may have to extract vast amounts of greenhouse gases from the air by 2100 to achieve a target for limiting global warming, a draft U.N. report showed on Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: World May Have to Suck Gases From Air to Meet Climate Goals-U.N.
headline.main: World May Have to Extract Gases From Air, U.N. Says

lead_paragraph: Governments may have to extract vast amounts of greenhouse gases from the air by 2100 to achieve a target for limiting global warming, a draft U.N. report showed on Wednesday.
